overview_of_class:
Class Overview:

This is the first in a sequence of three workshop courses that second year MFA students in Writing for the Screen and Stage will complete during the 2016-2017 academic year. After completion of all three courses, each student will have created at least one full-length project for film, theatre or television.

During RTVF 564, students writing a feature film or a play will complete a brief premise/synopsis, a treatment, and the first section of a script. Students writing a television project will complete a premise/synopsis for a series, a plot outline for a pilot and, dependent on episode length, fulfill any additional writing requirements in consultation with the instructor.


CLASS MATERIALS (REQUIRED):

Plays and Screenplays TBA

Working computer, internet access, NU email/account, word processing program, xeroxing of materials required for class discussions.
